title: â€˜Survivor: Micronesia' Rewatch With Ozzy Lusth
description:
This week, Tyson and Riley are joined by Ozzy Lusth to discuss the truth about his blindsiding and to learn the details of his showmance. Plus, he explains why his fake idol was more convincing in person and what his strategy would be if he were to play again.
Hosts: Tyson Apostol and Riley McAtee
Guest: Ozzy Lusth
Associate Producer: Mike Wargon
